title: The Wild Life - 1984 - DVD5. VHS Rip. NTSC.DVD-R. *RARE*
description:
Rare as shit. 1984. 
DVD5. VHS Rip. NTSC. DVD-R. 
Region and Encryption Free. 
Digitally Remastered as best as I can. 
They dont make this on DVD so this as good as its going to get.
